item.title: .vimrc
item.description:
设置数字 设置相对数字 设置 undodir=~/.local/state/vim/undo/ 设置 undofile 设置 noswapfile 设置 viminfo= 设置 nohlsearch设置 tabstop=4 设置 shiftwidth=4 设置 softtabstop=4let mapleader=" "nnoremap y "+y vnoremap y "+y nnoremap d "_d vnoremap d "_d nnoremap x "_x vnoremap x "_xnnoremap e :Exautocmd BufWritePre * :%s/\s\+$//e autocmd BufWritePost .zig :execute "!zig fmt %:p" | :e | :redraw! autocmd BufWritePost .rs :execute "!rustfmt %:p" | :e | :redraw!
